title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9003.30 - Geocaching; Treasure Hunting Games
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9003.30 - Geocaching; Treasure Hunting Games

State Regulations

Geocaching or other treasure hunting games, activities, devices, logbooks, trinkets, or other materials, are not allowed within any
park except as may be expressly permitted by ParksCorp. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
9003.30

Adopted

New

York State Register July 8, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 27, eff. 7/8/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
